basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education and Professional Studies who are majoring in Adult and Higher Education Eligibility Requirements Open to any student majoring in Adult and Higher Education Demonstrates financial need Demonstrates high academic achievements Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
